name: Pro-Tec Athletics X-Trac Dual Support Knee Support
description: Keep your patella on the right track by giving it the support it deserves.Provides support to help with the recovery of patellar and quadriceps tendonitis.Helps with patellar tracking disorders.X-shape applies compression and support, without restricting airflow like traditional braces.Circumference measured 2cm above top of patella is 30.5-36.8cm for Small, 36.8-42cm for Medium and 42-50cm for Large.
